t: Amazon opens one of its biggest US facilities in East Valley
s: June 11, 2023 - Tom Orr, part of the leadership team at Amazon's new KRB9 facility in Mesa, looks at the empty shelves of the new 1.2 million-square-foot storage and distribution center. Soon the site's shelves will be filled with product from third-party-sellers.

t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: Amazon opens one of its biggest US facilities in East Valley
s: June 14, 2023 - Amazon’s newest facility in Mesa is one of the largest of its kind in the country. The company opened a new storage and distribution center.

t: East Valley cities line up to win new Amazon headquarters | News | eastvalleytribune.com
s: September 20, 2017 - Tempe, the only East Valley city that already has an Amazon facility, will look to leverage that existing relationship with the company to bring the project to the city.
